name: Little Lantern (yuenaa)
description:
Overview

Little Lantern is a 2D puzzle platformer where Oppy the cat uses a lantern to manipulate special blocks within the level. Navigate through tricky dungeon levels by holding, dropping, or throwing your lantern to make blocks appear, disappear, or even move! Learn about the existence of the underworld and discover secrets along the way. Help Oppy escape the dog-ruled dungeon and make it back home.

Credits ProgrammingYuri Chen
Danielle Phillips
Edison Situ
Sarah Vanderyt
Jessica ZhuMusicRachel BeanArtJean Chang
Yuri Chen
Jessica Zhu Peachyy Slayy Studio

Peachyy Slayy Studio is a 5 person developer group formed in EECS 494 at University of Michigan. Together, they continued developing Sarah Vanderyt's prototype project, Little Lantern. Along the way in their 7 week journey, they recruited MUSPERF 300 student, Rachel Bean, to compose music for the game and fellow UMich student and friend, Jean Chang, to create the title art.
